text: Naucalpan, officially Naucalpan de Juárez, is a municipality in the Mexican state of Mexico. The name Naucalpan comes from Nahuatl language. It means “place of the four neighborhoods or four houses". It is just northwest of Mexico City. The population of the municipality is 833,779 people. The seat of the municipality is Naucalpan de Juárez. The municipality was formed in 1826. ==Government== Mayor Period Eduardo Alfredo Contreras y Fernández 2000-2003 Ángelica Moya Marín 2003-2006 José Luis Durán Reveles 2006-2009 Otilia María Olivares Villagomez 2009-2012 David Ricardo Sánchez Guevara 2012-2015 Edgar Armando Olvera Higuera 2015-2018 Patricia Alicia Durán Reveles 2019-2021 Angélica Moya Marín 2021-2024 == Demography == Settlements Population Total Municipality 833,779 Naucalpan de Juárez 792,211 San Francisco Chimalpa 6,294 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Naucalpan de Juárez
title: Naucalpan de Juárez Municipality
